text: This is a story about three of my friends that I met in 1949 when I started college. Actually I met them before that, we became friends after we all... went to school at the same place.
keypoint: Owen sits by the fire, lost in uneasy thoughts

text: Previous to that during high school we'd all been high school athletes at different schools, and so we were acquainted. But then after graduation when we all enrolled in school, we found that the four of us were all now attending the same school, and we became quite good friends.
keypoint: He reacts to a sound, but it's only a deer
